entries.name: Digest::SHA2.new(bitlen = 256) → digest_objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Create a new SHA2 hash object with a given bit length.

entries.name: block_length → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return the block length of the digest in bytes.

entries.name: digest_length → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return the length of the hash value (the digest) in bytes.

entries.name: reset → digest_objclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Reset the digest to the initial state and return self.
